verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Our Father who art in Heaven, newline Hallowed by Thy name. newline Thy kingdom come, Thy will be done, newline On earth as it is in heaven.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Give us this day our daily bread; newline And forgive us our trespasses newline As we forgive those newline Who trespass against us.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And lead us not into temptation, newline But deliver from evil, newline For thine is the kingdom, newline And the power and the glory forever. newline Amen.
